channel.title: Arbitrary Data Analysis
channel.description: Recent content on Arbitrary Data Analysis

item.title: test post citizenship acquisition of Brits in the EU
item.description: This is just a test post Hi everyone. This is just a test post. I am trying to sort out how I could create a blog with R (using the blogdown package) on github pages. This description - among other great online resources - helped me doing it. To test if it works, I show below citizenship acquisitions of British people in other EU country before and after Brexit vote.

item.title: About
item.description: This is a “hello world” example website for the blogdown package. The theme was forked from @jrutheiser/hugo-lithium-theme and modified by Yihui Xie.
